sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 

'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,

'@{item().SrcSystem}' as SrcSystem,
'@{item().SrcStoredProcedure}' as Source,
'@{item().DestEntity}' as Destination,
'Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount' as CopyActivity,

'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,

'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.rowsSkipped}' as RowsSkipped,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.usedParallelCopies}' as ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as EffectiveIntegrationRuntime,

'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_StartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_EndTime,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_QueuingDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_TimeToFirstByte_SS,
'@{activity('Trfd_to_Dest - HousingAccount').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_TransferDuration_SS,
2 as CopyActivity_Stage,
'@{pipeline().parameters.SequenceGroup}' as SequenceGroup
